F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
ADDRESS ALL
COMMUNICATIONS
TO THE DIRECTOR
WNYC
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING, N,Y# 7
WORTH 2-5600
January 31, 1944
Mr. Trank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
N» As E, B*
Station ft ILL
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
You certainly are turning out a good paper. I didn*t kno%
I made the A.P. news circuit vhtil I read your Newsletter*—I didn11
even know my name was mentioned in that story, hut who am I to
challenge the accuracy of the A.P*
I thought I asked you, in my last note, about FM. How are
you getting along with yours and where do the rest of the stations
stand? I hope you1!! devote some space in your next issue about
this and ask the other guys to step in and look into the mattert
seriously. Y0u remember, I argued that point some years back at
one of our meetings.
Regards,
Very sincerely yours,
' Director
MSI;: sd
168
'New York City’s Own Station”—830 Kc.
